result.execSummary:
The defendant Angela Rose Pomasl was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Angela Rose Pomasl is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Angela Rose Pomasl was found guilty of Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes:
Provide DNA sample within 30 days. 
Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections. 
2 days credit if probation is revoked.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angela Rose Pomasl

records.addlTxt: Pierce County DNA Proof of Submission
Documents 15-16 were erased. Scanned into wrong case.

3:11 PM  Assistant District Attorney Kaley Walker in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Angela Rose Pomasl in Court.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in Court for Angela Rose Pomasl.  ADA Walker recites agreement; Count One amended (Amended Information filed).  State moving to dismiss Count Two.  Joint recommendation for one year probation and costs of $443.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the Court; Court reviews with Defendant.  Defendant pleads Guilty to Amended Count One.  Attorneys stipulate to facts.  Court finds a factual basis to accept the plea.  Court finds Defendant is freely, voluntarily and knowingly making plea and waiving constitutional rights.  Court finds Defendant Guilty of Amended Count One and enters conviction.  Count Two dismissed.  ADA Walker states position, notes two days credit.  Atty. Chapman states position.  Defendant makes statement.  Court addresses Defendant.  Court sentences Defendant, W/H.  One year Probation.  Specific conditions to be set by Agent.  $443 costs.  Two days credit if revoked.  DNA sample to be provided w/in 30 days.  Defendant to report to Probation today.  Appeal rights are given to the Defendant.  Adjourned at 3:25 PM
Plea hearing on September 27, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
filed by ADA Kaley Walker. eif
Pre-trial conference on July 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

02:49 PM Defendant Angela Rose Pomasl appears via phone from SCC Jail with Attorney Daniel James Chapman via phone.  Defendant Angela Rose Pomasl in custody.  ADA Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of rights.  Court finds defendant freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a preliminary hearing.  Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for further proceedings.  Atty. Chapman requests Arraignment set after PTC as Defendant will not be in custody very long.  Court questions Defendant's addres and phone.  Adjourned at 2:54 PM  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
granting Defense's request to appear remotely.
to Appear Remotely filed by Atty Chapman

records.addlTxt:
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
NO CONTACT WHATSOEVER WITH A.G.M.

3:27 PM Defendant Angela Rose Pomasl appears from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS  w/conditions of AS & NC w/A.G.M., no objection. Court so orders. DE may qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:34 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
